name: Adidas Stan Smith Shoes
description: These Stan Smiths are part of that first bold step into the future. Graphics with a hand-drawn look remind us that each one of us has an individual part to play in building a better future.
shortDescription: This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

name: Adidas NMD_R1 Shoes
description: The incredible energy return of adidas Boost is created by fusing together energy capsules, giving you the power to keep your feet moving.
shortDescription: A collaboration with female-owned print studio HER Studio London, showcasing their eye and mind for bold patterns on adidas silhouettes.

name: Adidas ULTRA4D Shoes
description: Liquid resin, light and oxygen are combined to create a futuristic lattice midsole. The result is precise tuning and long-lasting comfort.
shortDescription: A foot-hugging knit upper is supplemented with a supportive cage and heel counter, and a high-traction outsole keeps you secure on your feet.

name: Adidas Superstar Shoes
description: They've got a smooth leather upper with sporty 3-Stripes and a heel tab.
shortDescription: They're finished off with the world-famous rubber shell toe.

name: Adidas NMD_R1 Primeknit Shoes
description: These adidas shoes combine inspiration from the most iconic NMDs and create a bold statement through color. Continue the legacy with signature NMD plugs and a flexible sock-like upper.
shortDescription: Energy-returning cushioning keeps you comfortable all day. The party is already off to a solid start with these ones.

name: Adidas OZWEEGO Shoes
description: These adidas OZWEEGO Shoes evolve the code of an innovative late-'90s runner.
shortDescription: A mixed-material upper combines with Adiprene cushioning for a retro look with an amazing feel.

name: Adidas Forum Low Shoes
description: The adidas Forum shoes made a splash the moment they stepped out onto the hardwood in the '80s. So it's only fitting that this modern version gets splashed with bright colors in return.
shortDescription: The signature ankle strap and X-detail stand out even more.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 21 Shoes
description: The new Torsion System provides a 15% increase in forefoot bending stiffness for a more responsive run.
shortDescription: 6% more Boost capsules ready to explode with energy in each step.

name: Adidas Ultraboost S&L DNA Shoes
description: The incredible energy return of adidas Boost is created by fusing together energy capsules, giving you the power to keep your feet moving.
shortDescription: Egle Zvirblyte is an artist whose work explores themes of identity, love and female power.

name: ASICS Gel-Nimbus 23
description: Providing the runner with excellent shock absorption and softness, the GEL-NIMBUS® 23 delivers more compression in the heel thanks to its softer GEL® technology cushioning unit and contoured design lines.
shortDescription: Under the toe, the inclusion of gender-specific pillars help cushion the body and help runners experience a softer feel.

name: ASICS Gel-Kayano 27 Tokyo
description: The midsole integrates SPACE TRUSSTIC™ technology, which provides stability and reduces the overall weight to help promote a smoother transition from footstrike to toe-off. This added stability is complemented by deeper forefoot flex grooves that create a smoother roll through toe-off, allowing the shoe to move more naturally with the foot.
shortDescription: Featuring a limited model offering, this iteration is displayed with a Sunrise Red colorway to celebrate the city of Tokyo and the country of Japan.

name: ASICS Gel-Venture 8
description: This versatile shoe is excellent for trail runs, light hiking or exploring a new city. This model has been updated with a more accommodating forefoot fit, while reducing the amount of overlays around the forefoot without sacrificing durability.
shortDescription: the outsole is more durable with a traction pattern that's been improved with re-engineered lugs under the heel.
